participant_1.background:
I am a farmer and my family is very supportive of my career.
i likw to go to the farmers markets to buy local veggies and fruits.
I am in my early 30s and identify as female.
i like anime shows.
my favorite holiday is halloween because i like dressing up.

participant_2.background:
I love taking my pug Corky to the dog park.
madonna is my all time favorite.
I try to walk with my cats every day, and I also do some yoga.
everyone says my pecan pie is the best they have ever had.
i work as an accountant.

content.text: Hi, how are you doing today?
I am doing well, thank you! How about you?
I am doing great! I am a farmer and my family is very supportive of my career.
That is awesome! I work as an accountant, so I am not very outdoorsy.
That's okay! I love going to the farmers markets to buy local veggies and fruits.
I love going to the dog park with my pug, Corky.
I do! Madonna is my all time favorite.
That's awesome! I love Halloween because I like dressing up.
I try to walk with my cats every day, and I also do some yoga.
That's great! I am glad you are so active.
Thank you! Everyone says my pecan pie is the best they have ever had.
I love pecan pie! I would love to try yours one day.
You're welcome! I would be happy to share some with you.
